No this is not a face recognition application - the problem we are 
working on is object recognition and tracking for collision 
avoidance/following in a mobile robot environment where boulders, 
sidewalks and car avoidance under varying light and background 
conditions is required.  Not an easy problem.

Steve
--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Ian Badcoe <ian_badcoe@y...> wrote:
> 
> >We are investigating the development of a real time, using ANN 
based,
> >in-scene object recognizer/tracker running on an embedded processor
> 
> ...this isn't for recognising faces at airports is it?
> 
>          Ian
